channel.title: Suggestions for fire?
channel.description:
So I have this picture of a dragon. I want to make it look like he is breathing fire. I want in the background like a burning city/village type of theme.
I am not asking for a request just suggestions on how about going about doing it. My PS knowledge is 1.
